name: nbtstat

procedures: T1016::[nbtstat] can be used to discover local NetBIOS domain names.
T1049::[nbtstat] can be used to discover current NetBIOS sessions.

description: [nbtstat](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0102) is a utility used to troubleshoot NetBIOS name resolution. (Citation: TechNet Nbtstat)
